pageContext.title: Tech in Asia Jakarta 2018 by the numbers (INFOGRAPHIC)
pageContext.content:
On October 23 & 24, we had our seventh run of Tech in Asia Jakarta. The conference saw 5,227 startups, corporates, investors, industry experts, and tech community gathered for two days of power-packed talks and networking.

Some highlights included John Fitzpatrick, head of Google Cloud’s Startup Program in Asia, sharing the four elements startups needed to get to “hyperscale”, and Grab’s CTO, Theo Vassilakis advising data scientists and developers to get behind something they believe in.

You can still catch up on our conference coverage, but if you’re into numbers, here’s a nifty infographic of Tech in Asia Jakarta 2018, thanks to our friends at Piktochart.

(Click to view enlarged image)

 
Thank you once again to all our attendees, volunteers, speakers, sponsors and partners for contributing to this conference’s success. Meanwhile, sit tight as we’re getting ready to bring you another great show next year – we’ll see you then!

seo.title: Tech in Asia Jakarta 2018 by the numbers
seo.description: #tiajkt2018 brought together thousands of tech enthusiasts across 2 days. Here’s a quick breakdown of the numbers.
